column5: Finally got to the bottom of it today.... worked on the last details..... it turned out pretty good.  I must say that while working at it and watching the Paralympic opener and then onto the mens sledge hockey game.... I was pretty happy about what I was doing to this project.  First Rick Hensen got a terrific tribute to his solo accomplishment and then they honored our Canadian hero Terry Fox which I could not help myself into feeling a little wet around the eye balls during his tribute  Brought back great memories and remembered the publicity that his solo marathon attempt across Canada had done for cancer research and I was real glad that they had not forgotten about him  Now..... here's what I ended up doing.  Wanted to display their accomplishments and only way to do this was the medal count.  You can see that 14 7 5 and 26 is displayed    Another closer look for the "GO CANADA GO"    A shot from a little further away to see the full piece    and another    Hope that our paralympic athletes do well in their game    GO CANDA GO Enjoy!!! Leechman
Man, you must REALLY like cribbage! Very nice work sir!
Thanks HTHM!!!  Can you say passion Working on another spur of the moment today Stay tune for some more   Thanks troutboy!!!
awesome job leech thats a 29 hand witch i have never got yet
Thanks corvy!!! This one's up for grab..... PM me if interested
ill take it jaques....  only if you let me wear it as a necklace!
LOL  You want everything   Thanks Kinger!!!  It turned out pretty awesome
Very cool.  I remember playing as a boy.
Thanks Chris!!!  I haven't played in a couple of years myself but truly enjoy the challenge of making a unique piece and then sit down and play a game on it
